Package ev3dev.actuators

Interface BrickLCD

  • All Superinterfaces:
    lejos.hardware.lcd.CommonLCD, lejos.hardware.lcd.GraphicsLCD
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LCDJessie, LCDStretch
    public interface BrickLCD
extends lejos.hardware.lcd.GraphicsLCD
    Interface that extends GraphicsLCD to provide APIs for easy string printing to LCD, without having to implement TextLCD interface.
    Author:
    nicopao

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface lejos.hardware.lcd.CommonLCD

      • Fields inherited from interface lejos.hardware.lcd.GraphicsLCD

    • Method Detail

      • drawString

        void drawString​(java.lang.String str,
                int x,
                int y)
        Prints a string on LCD. By default:
        • anchor point is TOP-LEFT
        • text color is black
        • bg color is white
        Parameters:
        str - - string to print
        x - - horizontal position in characters
        y - - vertical position in lines

      • drawString

        void drawString​(java.lang.String str,
                int x,
                int y,
                boolean inverted)
        Prints a string on LCD. By default, anchor point is TOP-LEFT
        Parameters:
        str - - string to print
        x - - horizontal position in characters
        y - - vertical position in lines
        inverted - - if false, print black text on white bg; if true, white text on black bg
